verbose_text: We observed that either TGF-beta1 or EGF alone were able to induce EMT and that stimulation with TGF-beta1 was more potent than stimulation with EGF in the regulation of EMT, as measured through a change in the behavioral phenotype and the expression of EMT associated molecules, further suggesting that TGF-beta1 is an important inducer of EMT.
evidence: TGF-beta1 is an important inducer of EMT
